thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Credit Suisse Starts Last Year of Revamp With Rise in Profit

author: Pietro Lombardi
title: Credit Suisse Starts Last Year of Revamp With Rise in Profit
text:
Credit Suisse Group AG on Wednesday posted a strong rise in first-quarter net profit, beating expectations and bolstering evidence that the Swiss lenderâ€™s yearslong restructuring has put it back on track to growth.
Net profit grew 16% to 694 million Swiss francs ($709.1 million) as revenue rose 1.8% to 5.64 billion francs. Analysts had expected Credit Suisse to report net profit of 653 million francs on revenue of 5.49 billion francs.
...
